entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle or flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%

Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon.
